item.Q:
Write the character:
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
item.A: ya

item.Q:
Write the character:
multitude; abbr. for 眾議院|众议院 House of Representatives
item.A:
traditional: 眾
zhòng
群众 (群眾) qúnzhòng the masses

item.Q:
Write the character:
duty; responsibility; to reproach; to blame
item.A:
traditional: 責
zé
负责 (負責) fùzé in charge of; to be responsible for (sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
soldiers; a force; an army; weapons; arms; military; warlike
item.A:
bīng
民兵 mínbīng people's militia; militia

zhì
智慧 zhìhuì wisdom; knowledge

item.Q:
Write the character:
mistake; error; to miss; to harm; to delay; to neglect
item.A:
traditional: 誤
wù
错误 (錯誤) cuòwù error; mistake; mistaken

item.Q:
Write the character:
border; place; condition; boundary; circumstances; territory
item.A:
jìng
环境 (環境) huánjìng environment; circumstances; surroundings

item.Q:
Write the character:
nature's color; green or blue; greenish black; youth; young (of people); abbr. for Qinghai province 青海
item.A:
qīng
青年 qīngnián youth

item.Q:
Write the character:
to obey; to follow; to arrange; to make reasonable; along; favorable
item.A:
顺 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 順
shùn
顺序 (順序) shùnxù sequence; order

item.Q:
Write the character:
field; plain; open space; limit; boundary; rude; wild
item.A:
yě
野生 yěshēng wild; undomesticated

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname Chu; ancient place name; distinct; clear; orderly; pain; suffering
item.A:
chǔ
清清楚楚 qīngqīngchǔchǔ clear

item.Q:
Write the character:
expensive; noble; your (name); precious
item.A:
traditional: 貴
guì
贵族 (貴族) guìzú lord; nobility; nobleman; noblewoman; aristocrat; aristocracy

item.Q:
Write the character:
lose; negative (math. etc); to bear; to carry (on one's back)
item.A:
traditional: 負
fù
负责 (負責) fùzé in charge of; to be responsible for (sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to press; to push down; to keep under (control)
2: in the first place; to crush
item.A:
traditional: 壓
1: yā 2: yà
压力 (壓力) yālì pressure 低气压 (低氣壓) dīqìyà low pressure area

shǐ
历史 (歷史) lìshǐ history

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to fit
2: to fit; to suit
item.A:
适 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 適
1: kuò 2: shì
适当 (適當) kuòdāng suitable 适当 (適當) shìdàng suitable; appropriate

item.Q:
Write the character:
be; connection; relation; tie up; bind
item.A:
traditional: 係
xì

item.Q:
Write the character:
side; to lean; to survey; to measure; conjecture
item.A:
测 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 測
cè
测量 (測量) cèliàng survey

traditional: 錯誤
cuòwù error; mistake; mistaken

yālì pressure

traditional: 適當
kuòdāng suitable
shìdàng suitable; appropriate

traditional: 負責
fùzé in charge of; to be responsible for (sth)

traditional: 環境
huánjìng environment; circumstances; surroundings
qīngchu clear; clearly understood; distinct

traditional: 適用
shìyòng be applicable

traditional: 爭取
zhēngqǔ fight for; compete for (a prize); to struggle

traditional: 適應
shìyìng to suit; to fit; to be suitable; to adapt; to get used to sth.

traditional: 測量
cèliàng survey

traditional: 責任
zérèn responsibility; blame; duty

traditional: 測定
cèdìng to survey and evaluate
měitiān every day; everyday

traditional: 作業
zuòyè school assignment; homework; work; task; operation; to operate
bǐzhòng proportion; specific gravity

traditional: 高興
gāoxìng happy; glad; willing (to do sth); in a cheerful mood

traditional: 指標
zhǐbiāo norm; index; target

traditional: 聲明
shēngmíng statement; declaration
